episodes.title: मंडल एक - अग्नि की प्रथम ज्योति
episodes.subtitle: The First Light of Agni
episodes.description: Journey into Mandala 1, the longest book of the Rigveda. Discover how Agni, the sacred fire, illuminates the path to divine wisdom and learn about Indra's epic battle with Vritra.

episodes.title: मंडल दो - अश्विन देव
episodes.subtitle: The Divine Physicians
episodes.description: Meet the celestial healers - the Ashwins, twin gods who ride the golden chariot at dawn and possess miraculous healing powers.

episodes.title: मंडल तीन - विश्वामित्र का ज्ञान
episodes.subtitle: Vishwamitra's Wisdom
episodes.description: Explore the profound hymns composed by the great sage Vishwamitra, including the sacred Gayatri Mantra.

episodes.title: मंडल चार - वामदेव की दृष्टि
episodes.subtitle: Vamadeva's Vision
episodes.description: Delve into the mystical visions of Rishi Vamadeva and his profound understanding of cosmic order.

episodes.title: मंडल पांच - अत्रि की उपासना
episodes.subtitle: Atri's Devotion
episodes.description: Experience the devotional hymns of the Atri family, celebrating the gods of nature and cosmic forces.

episodes.title: मंडल छह - भरद्वाज का मार्ग
episodes.subtitle: Bharadvaja's Path
episodes.description: Follow the spiritual path illuminated by Rishi Bharadvaja through powerful invocations to Indra and Agni.

episodes.title: मंडल सात - वशिष्ठ की वाणी
episodes.subtitle: Vasishtha's Voice
episodes.description: Listen to the eloquent hymns of Vasishtha, one of the greatest sages, praising Varuna and the cosmic order.

episodes.title: मंडल आठ - कण्व की कविता
episodes.subtitle: Kanva's Poetry
episodes.description: Immerse yourself in the poetic beauty of the Kanva family's compositions celebrating divine glory.

episodes.title: मंडल नौ - सोम का स्तोत्र
episodes.subtitle: Hymns to Soma
episodes.description: Discover the mystical hymns dedicated entirely to Soma, the divine nectar of immortality and enlightenment.

episodes.title: मंडल दस - ब्रह्मांड के रहस्य
episodes.subtitle: Mysteries of the Universe
episodes.description: Conclude the journey with the profound philosophical hymns exploring creation, death, and the ultimate reality.
